metadata.name: Lemegeton Wisp Count
metadata.description:
This mod adds a counter with the number of wisps spawned by the Lemegeton active item. When multiple characters are present, the wisp icon color will change and a small number will be shown to indicate to whom belongs the wisps.
The counter does not show unless a character has the Lemegeton, or owns a wisp of the Lemegeton item.
[quote]You can find the source code [url=https://github.com/FerMod/BoIMods/blob/main/lemegeton_wisp_count]here[/url][/quote]
